recipe.title: Creamy Mushroom Toasts Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 teaspoon ; Paprika, plus extra for garnish

steps.step: Pour in heavy cream and scallions (reserve a couple scallions for garnishing). Stir to combine, then remove from the heat and set aside.
Brush both sides of the pieces of bread with olive oil. Toast bread in a skillet over low heat until golden brown on both sides.
